name: Hentai Woman
description: With 3d puzzle you will feel comfortable and enjoy yourself.

name: Hentai Arcade: Lustful Girls
description: Hentai Arcade: Lustful Girls is a collection of various games to raise your mood. And not only. There is 5 different and non-standard modes, 45 great artworks, ultra relaxing music, Super-Zoom and 54 achievements.

name: Demolition Robots K.K.
description:
Demolition Robots K. K. is Co-op 4 players multiplayer game.
Control mega-robots but don’t fight each other, player’s work is destroying buildings in the whole city as soon as you can for earn money!

name: Cargo Cult
description: Tear through the Trash Dunes on a stolen rocket, evading misshapen mutants, giant sentient maggots, and pistol poppin' pigeons. Build up your ship piece by piece with whatever you find in the dungeons below. Mutate your DNA to gain abilities and try to survive the frenzied onslaught. You won't.

name: Ebola VI Corp
description: After the war ended on April 4, 2048, few survived. For the first time in history, the most dangerous biological weapons were used. On the first day, most of the planet was destroyed by zombies. Trick them and set a goal - survive.

name: It's possible
description: Squeeze past buzzsaws, dodge deadly spikes, and jump over burning acid in this challenging indie platformer made with love!

name: MagiCats Worlds
description: MagiCats WorldsTravel through time to preserve the future! Turn the clock back looking out for the Shards of Time in MagiCats Worlds! Explore worlds, rediscover ways of playing, fight enemies, resolve puzzles and much more in an unforeseen adventure designed by talented creators from all over the world!

name: Unsacrifice
description: Unsacrifice is a classic survival horror game compile in a solo campaign. You will play as a priest apprendice, lost in a world full of mysteries, hidden dangers and deformed creatures that the player has to escape from.

name: National Girls
description: Support your country by solving these cute anime puzzles!

name: I Can Gun
description: Everyone can shoot, but not everyone can gun. In this FPS you will have to operate your weapon in full detail while scavenging a procedurally generated level protected by machines that don't even know what mercy is. Find all documents to beat the game. Playable with Mouse+Keyboard and/or in VR (HTC Vive, Oculus Rift).

name: Diamond love
description: A simple RPG game, for the sake of love

name: Thrunt XL
description: Thrunt XL is a super-tricky time-attack thrust-em-up. Take control (roughly speaking) of an agile but fragile Lander. Race through a series of increasingly ridiculous levels packed with deadly machinery, deadly defences, deadly... actually everything's deadly.

name: BlackHoopS
description: BlackhoopS is a unique kind of visual novel. Every time you start a new game, you will discover different changes about the story. During your adventure, you can use the power you achieved, to change the world.

name: Hentai Puzzle Classic
description: Hentai Puzzle Classic - this is a new erotic puzzle-game in which you will need to solve different pictures.

name: Don't Save the Princess
description: An anti-runner in which you control the obstacles instead of the runner. Strike, combo, and upgrade to finally earn the princess some personal time!

name: Insect Planet TD
description: The distant space expedition to the Earth-like planet, finally ended. We came here for the purpose of colonization, but we are faced with alien creatures. We have no choice we must conquer this planet.

name: Insect Planet TD
description: The distant space expedition to the Earth-like planet, finally ended. We came here for the purpose of colonization, but we are faced with alien creatures. We have no choice we must conquer this planet.

name: Triwave
description: Triwave is a chill and challenging arcade puzzle game, featuring deep and unique gameplay, hypnotic visuals, and mesmerizing beats. Currently early in development.

name: D'lirium: The Golden Rogue
description: An experimental satiric 2D-shooter game, a prequel for the original D'LIRIUM game. The Golden Rogue combines the mechanics of the original game, adding the new features, levels and enemies.

name: No Signal
description: The game about the plane will allow you to sit at the helm of a metal bird and feel the pleasure of flying.

name: Gravity Wars: Black Hole
description: Create whole constellations, expand the boundaries of your possessions, feel yourself creator of the universe and meet face to face with his rival in exciting, spectacular, universal scales of battle!

name: The Fur in Me
description: The Fur in Me is a 2D platform match color game where you follow a young Fur in a quest to save his own world from the mad Fearflies. To do so, you'll have to smash your enemies while matching your color with theirs .

name: Thirst For Life
description: There was a local catastrophe in France and people began to turn into mutants for some unknown reason.

name: Fairyland: Fairylines
description: This is a Match 3 game. But not in the form that modern players are accustomed to. There are no levels, progress, or achievements in the game. It’s more of the classic Match 3, as it was at times of the origination of this genre.

name: Tormentum II
description: Tormentum II is a point & click adventure game taking place in a dark, surreal world full of gloomy characters and repulsive creatures taken straight from the scariest horrors.

name: Unknown's Survival : Player Battlegrounds
description: Welcome to Unknown's Survival : Player Battlegrounds , a Third person Cover based shooter. Bring in your friends and join the battle to become the best player of the Season.

name: No Body Home
description: No Body Home is the story of two little ghosts searching for delicious cake in a house that’s haunted … with humans!

name: Ni no Kuni II: Revenant Kingdom - Labyrinth of the Ghost King
Deadhaus Sonata
description: Deadhaus Sonata is a cooperative multiplayer, free-to-play, action RPG where you play the dead fighting the living. An unstoppable force from Deadhaus, you are a monster among men, dealing death and destruction on a massive scale.

name: Follow JC Go
description: The Vatican's version of Pokemon Go.

name: Spintires: MudRunner - American Wilds
description: This content requires the base game MudRunner on Steam in order to play.Upgrade your MudRunner with the American Wilds Expansion and enjoy a slew of new additions, including 9 iconic US trucks from household brands like Ford, Hummer and Chevrolet, dozens of new vehicles add-ons, 2 new sandbox maps inspired by the rough lands of Montana and North Dakota, and 2 new challenge maps!

name: Stationary RPG
description: Stationary is a game with all the classic elements of the rpg games, with an ambience and history based on a science fiction environment in a space station. You will have to discover the truth of a mystery that does not seem to have a solution.

name: The Legends Gate: Awoken
description: The Legends Gate: Awoken is a new epic medieval universe.

name: Sky Tracers
description: Jump over rooftops, scale sky scrapers and fight off hostile robots as you master the almost infinite depth of rocket parkour. Find and carve your very own path through challenging courses in a frantic multiplayer race.

name: Yet Another Exhausted Day
description: A 3D crawling platformer about ordinary people’s exhausting lives. Play as an exhausted person, evade comfy pillows, smash photo frames and flower pots, brawl with vacuum cleaners, and do everything you can to fight the drowsiness.

name: Project Nova
description: Set in the Eve Online universe

name: Pinball FX3: Williams Table Pack Vol. 1
HotPuzzle:Grils
description: HotPuzzle:Grils is a simple puzzle game, game pictures are carefully selected by the developers of the picture, come quickly, immersed in the hot beauty map.

name: Hentai Ahegao
description: Hentai Ahegao is a logic game with a lot of candid pictures.

name: Royal Wedding Quest!
description: Royal wedding Quest! is a fantasy otome/dating sim game where your character goes on a quest to find a husband and claim the throne of her country.

name: Mathel
description: Mathel Idle is a new Free idle game with Match3 system which replaces the normal clicking aspect of idle games. Either match the orbs yourself or stay idle and let the AI match them for you. Explore the new mapping feature and acquire equipment to progress through the game.

name: The Hermit
description: You are a special forces ATTA corporation. During the failed test, an "S" virus leak occurred. The virus has infected you, gradually killing the living tissues of your body. Hurry up to find an antidote and save the world from a global catastrophe.

name: Dangerous Ground
description: Play a little, or a lot -- there's no skill ceiling, so you can always get better and better.

name: HenTris 2: Shemales
description: HenTris = Hentai + Tetris !!! In this edition of HenTris you must overcome all homophobia and all kinds of fascism to enjoy delicious images of transsexual love !!! A game about love, beauty, horniness and desire, against all forms of hate !!!

name: All For One
description: All For One is a fantasy-themed "Zero-Sum Free-For-All". When you defeat an enemy player, you gain all their accumulated experience points (XP), no matter how much stronger or weaker your foes are. Use experience points to unlock new abilities, weapons and skills so you can face stronger opponents.

name: This is your life
description:
This is your Life is a text-based life simulation game and a self-authoring interactive novel. Players follow the life of a human being from birth to death by influencing important life decisions at every stage of development, and can add their own experiences to the story. 
 
This is an EARLY PROTOTYPE.

name: Ghost Tappers
description:
You are the newest agent of S.C.O.T.C.H. - Your task: Explore the world and trap ghosts! 
But you will need the help of powerful traps, loyal companions and tasty mocktails to succeed.

name: SpiderSolitaire Black
description: Classic Solo play card game "Spider Solitaire" has been arranged in cool style!

name: Kimiheokuru Sora No Hana
description: In this campus, the spirit lives along with human. She hasn't a physical body for a long time, so she's called a spirit or ghost. Her kind can only be seen my me...I mean us, a certain type of people. From that day, we are connected in some way.

name: Backgammon, Chess & Checkers
description: Play either backgammon, chess or checkers against a virtual opponent, in a courtyard setting. Play on desktop or in VR.

name: Best of Fight
description: Do you fight better? Pump you in style and congratulate all enemies in the “Best Of Fight” Pick up weapons first and destroy all around.

name: Run Dant Run
description: Run as high as you can, collecting all the objects on your way to score points, get the longest distance from the records. Each object collected increases the speed of the game making it more difficult. Avoid colliding with the skulls they can take a life out of you. Good luck, and good fun in overcoming your record.

name: Project Police
description: Top-down, realistic police-simulation game. With a bunch of civilians around town, there is enough for you to do. Wether you want to patrol with someone else, or by yourself is up to you, and with a wide variety of random events, it is never boring!

name: Vortex of Pain
description: Liberate your city from a cult of simulation theory maniacs obsessed with conserving processing power. Vortex of Pain is a beat 'em up game with semi-procedural animations, breakable objects and flexible gameplay.

name: Ember Sword
description:
Ember Sword, a modern rewrite of the games industry business model in favor of the user, and a love letter to MMORPG (Massively Online Role Playing Game) gamers.

Ember Sword has the fast-paced combat of aRPGs, combined with the isometric view and skill-based abilities of MOBAs, set in a persistent MMORPG fantasy universe.

name: OnSpace
description: OnSpace - this is roguelike game in space setting. collect small stars and destroy another space ship.

name: 异种战争少女
description: The game is named "Valkyrie ", and it tells a story of the heroine's struggle against alien invasion of Earth. Our beautiful heroine will fight aginst oppression to win her freedom and take revenge on her father.

name: Ode to a Moon
description: A dark thriller investigating the mysterious aftermath of a sleepy town’s harvest festival. Will you unearth the truth or succumb to the unknown?

name: Galak-Z: The Virtual
description: 80’s spaceship anime and arcade-gaming meld with ultra-modern physics and A.I. in a skill-demanding, procedurally generated rogue-lite adventure! Be the hero in a world that oozes classic Saturday morning anime but plays like a tough, modern, tactical shooter. Try to survive the hostile environments of deep space, battling warring factions full of unique and cunning enemies. Unlock ever more powerful upgrades as you learn the secret of the GALAK-Z, and die and die again as you valiantly struggle to become the ultimate pilot – finally good enough to beat what Galak-Z throws at you!

name: Still Dark At Dawn
description: Built from the ground up for VR, Still Dark At Dawn's highly immersive gameplay will test your grit and ability to trust all of your senses, in a hope survive The Dawn.

name: Angry Birds FPS: First Person Slingshot
description: Angry Birds FPS is the first gaming experience developed entirely by an independent developer for Magic Leap’s spatial computing platform. A first-person slingshot lets players see incredibly realistic animated characters and objects overlaid onto their actual environment, bringing Angry Birds to life like never before – right in users’ homes.

name: Run Fairy
description: Whoever stole magical stars from fairies and scattered them in a shady and dangerous forest. Collect as many lost stars as possible. Classic runner about fairy, forest and evil animals.

name: Blockz VS Ballz
description: This is a symbiosis of several games. Collect balls in the squad and attack the cubes. The more blocks the squad wins, the more points the player gains. Play without any sounds and music. Just relax while controlling the balls.

name: Coop Tank War
description: "Coop Tank War" is a competitive local multiplayer game where 2 tanks fight to destroy each other and win the game. Perfect game to play in local multiplayer and have a good time.

name: Click the Business
description: "Click the business" is a simple clicker indie game, with simple mechanics and an environment and gameplay inspired by the business world.

name: There Is No Turning Back!
description: There Is No Turning Back is a roguelike survival RNG that reveals your true nature as you face increasingly anxiety-provoking maps of monsters and darkness. Exploration and rescuing helpless survivors can bring you great rewards, and each you save unlocks a trainable ability you can unlock (up to 4 total) to help you survive deeper into...

name: Vanguard: Fight For Rudiarius
description: A cross-platform multiplayer space shooter, set in an alternate future where the Roman Empire never fell but continued to conquer the entire galaxy. Gladiators, known as Vanguards, do battle in vast space arenas in a bid to earn freedom. VR, Mobile and PC cross play supported.

name: Draco's Misfortune
description: Follow Draco and Clyde the unluckiest bounty hunters in the land as they take on one last bounty. Draco's Misfortune is a hybrid of direct control and classic point and click games taking inspiration from retro classics such as Monkey Island and Day of the Tentacle.

name: Radio Violence
description: Radio Violence is a multiplayer "tower offense" game for up to four players on the same screen. Build radio towers to spread the influence of your cheeky dictators and take control of the board in this fast paced, action-strategy battle for supremacy!

name: F1 2018: Headline Edition
description: F1 2018 is the official videogame of the 2018 FIA FORMULA ONE WORLD CHAMPIONSHIP. Become immersed in the world of Formula 1 more than ever before when F1 2018 releases.

name: Petite Zombies
description: Protect your territory from the invasion of petite zombies. For better game convenience, use the stylus.

name: Guns 'n Guts
description: Guns 'n Guts is a fast-paced, top-down shooter filled with action and gore. Blast your way through hundreds of hellish enemies in challenging skill-based combat. Can you survive?

name: Light House Puzzle
description: "Light House Puzzle" is a strategy game with a simple mechanics but with moderate difficulty that will give you great fun during many levels.

name: Sky Flight
description: "Sky Flight" is a simple arcade game with retro graphics that simulates the return of a bird and its high-speed travel through rings.

name: Tank Bung
description: Tank Bung is a new rethinking of tank fights. Destruction of tanks and enemy bases. You can pump your tank and use additional boosters.

name: Ar-K: End Game
description: Ar-K: End Game is the final episode in the classic point and click saga of AR-K. Help Alicia Van Volish to escape from District 8 and discover the source of the mysterious Golden Sphere through a great story...

name: Holy Sheet
description: Holy Sheet is the game, where you have to cheat answers for your school test. Press the button to pick up the cheating list from your backpack. Be careful: if teacher goes near you, she will notice you cheating and the game will be ended. Time is limited - 5 minutes per exam.

name: Exodus: Rising
description: Exodus: Rising is a third person single player action RPG set in an entirely original hand crafted fantasy world.

name: Way-z
description: Help a player to pave the way to the finish in a puzzle-game Way-Z...

name: Star Thief
description: Star Thief is an action-adventure game in which you play as a space bandit, in a galaxy that has lost all sense of justice and order

name: AreaZ
description: AreaZ game is true survival simulation, where player has to rely on his knowledge and survival skills in different bioms or so called area(z). Starting on beach and jungle area(z) until player conquers the deadly swamp. Future game will include Rural mainland, Forrest and snow covered Mountains.

name: Monster Safari
description: Look at all these adorable monsters. I'm sure they'll make you happy if you raise them right! Oh, remember to keep an eye on their mood... they get destructive when they aren't happy! Don't forget to ensure the safety of your guests and staff. Come on in and start your park in Monster Safari! Everyone is counting on you! Rah rahrah!

name: Atomic Rancher
description: Atomic Rancher is a nuclear-fueled farming RPG that encourages players to grow, collect, and mutate their crops in order to grow and develop their town. Explore a vast and ruined world brimming with mystery and adventure. Will you thrive or only barely survive?

name: Infantry Online
description:
Infantry Online is a Massively Multiplayer Online (MMO) and is often referred to as the world's first 2D isometric shooter.

The game pits you against hundreds of other online players in whats often an all out frenetic combat lasting hours, whether you're defending a base from the opposite, fighting zombies to save man kind or playing a supportive role in many of the zones available.

You can feel the rush of adrenaline when you and hundreds of other plays clash on the battlefield. Go it alone or form-up into battalions. Tactics and skill determine the victor!

Invade an enemy's heavily fortified base with a well-organized group of teammates for final victory after hours of battle in a game of CTF. Get behind the controls of a heavily armed tank while a buddy mans the turret in a Skirmish battle. Assist in scoring a goal after narrowly avoiding death from the opposing team in a match of GravBall. Unload dozens of rounds into a group of enemies to save a teammate in Team Deathmatch. These are some of the intense experiences to be had in Infantry. Infantry hosts a wide variety of games with heart pounding action and addictive amounts of depth. Hundreds of players can compete on a single battlefield, working together to win the day or dueling against each other for personal glory. With a wide variety of weapons, vehicles, and player classes in the many different types of games, Infantry always offers something new.

name: Reality Falls
description: In a dusty, dilapidated town on the former Soviet steppe, a young traveller finds himself embroiled in a strange and surreal plot that threatens the very existence of Reality Falls itself. A story-driven indie adventure, with classic point-and-click puzzles and a retro JRPG-style look and feel.

name: Barbarian Trash
description: In this game you have to find a way out of the bunker, divided into levels. Your task is simple - to reach the end of the level and survive. Starting the game with your bare hands, in the course of the passage you will find a new weapon that will help you pass the game.

name: For God's Sake
description:
For God's Sake is a 2D Action-Platformer with souls-like elements. The game itself generates new trials and quests to provide varied and exciting stories. The world is full of humorous characters and dialogues as well atmospheric settings.

The game tells the story of a young cheeky god named Leigh. Weary of his tricks and ploys, the gods ban him from the kingdom of gods. To cancel his ban, he must face his greatest trial ever: helping people.

To be sure, Leigh follows their rules, the gods sent their uptight servant Tilly to observe Leigh. But the barefaced god nevertheless tries to deceive his ancestors and retaliate them for his exile.

There he comes across the dark secrets of the gods…

name: Shin Kaku Gi Kou and the 11 Destroyers
Three Treason Theories
description: If you want to play an RPG with a special story and have a good time facing the challenges and battles that it offers, do not hesitate to play this game.

name: Sunshine
description: If you want to have a good time playing a rpg of psychological horror and mystery setting in a boarding school and starring a student, you must play "Sunshine RPG"

name: Shadows Light
description: If you want to have a good time playing a rpg game in an apocalyptic environment and discover the history behind this chaos, you must play "Shadows Light RPG".

name: Slimes RPG
description: "Slimes RPG" is a perfect game for fans of rpg games, with all the elements characteristic of these games. A great adventure awaits you in this game with ambience and spatial plot.

name: Prison Break
description: "Prison Break RPG" is an indie game with all the basic elements of RPG games and set in a prison, you will have to try to escape!

name: It's good to be a pirate
description: "Suzaku Fly VR" is a casual game of simulation perfect to have a good time, you can also play it in VR mode!

name: Supersolar
description: Supersolar is a top-down action game where players control a gunship and battle swarms of AI drones and robot space squids using a large arsenal of weapons and gear. The game blends space shooter elements with "dungeon" crawling gameplay and everything is packed together in a story-driven singleplayer campaign with realistic, AAA graphics.

name: Iron Ascension
description: A virtual reality only climbing game set on large moving machines. You are a repair robot sent to diagnose and fix utilitarian machines that were created to serve humans and automate tasks in dangerous locations. Careful planning and precise movements are required to complete each stage without falling.

name: Sleight: Nerve Wracking Espionage Party Game
description: Engage with a friend in a nerve wracking lead and deceive hunt inside the manor to either leave in glory or failure!

name: Utopia Syndrome
description: Utopia Syndrome is an adventure game by Andrew Averkin (aka Utopia Games). It is an indie game project that will consist of several chapters, each with its own unique story, characters, time, environments and atmosphere full of adventures, puzzles and quests. It is a new perspective on «point and click» adventure games. Unique visual style and top-down gaming perspective. Immerse yourself in the dark corners of Utopia world to remember your past, present and future

name: Polzun
description: This is an arcade in the style of adventure. In the game you are waiting for a sufficient number of levels, on which you will meet enemies who want to stop you!

name: BombGears
description: BombGears is a strategy artillary multiplayer-only casual game, up to a 6 players free-for-all.

name: Antifector
description: You are an antivirus and you have just been installed. Use your weapons, bombs and move fast to clean the system, because it's full of deadly viruses that will not stop chasing you until they destroy you.

name: Empire of Devil
description: The civil war rage across the kingdom and the players in the battle for the throne use every possible mean in their pursuit to rule the land. A warrior enters in the game who build his army to besiege settlements, Fight battles. Will his choices make him Hero or a Devil feared by everyone?

name: River Relaxation VR
description: River Relaxation VR is a relaxing hands-free virtual reality simulation of calmly floating down a river in a kayak. You may choose between a morning and a night time experience.

name: Metropolisim
description: The deepest city-building simulation experience ever. Build, grow, and manage a world-class city. Take on the administrative tasks necessary to keep a modern-day city functioning. Construction, zoning, transportation, budgets, city services, and more. You're in control of it all. Are you ready, Mr. Mayor?

name: The Parchment: For the Realm
description: The Parchment is a turn-based strategie game, pitting different houses against each other in the fight for the crown. Use diplomacy, intrigue, trade and your military to subjugate other houses into vassalship or wipe them from history altogether.

name: Medieval Survival
description: Medieval Survival is a game that will immerse you in the most incredible events: it's a different world and completely different time.

name: No King No Kingdom VR
description: No King No Kingdom VR is a first person strategy for Oculus Rift. Feel the real power of royalty! Build your kingdom, raise a large army, become a King that travels to the different lands, fight with orcs and giant golems.

name: Crazy Tank
description: 《Crazy Tank》 is a third-person controlled Tank shooting game, the game screen is exquisite, process stimulation. After the game starts, your enemy headquarters will be opposite, you must destroy the enemy's tanks completely within the shortest time.

name: Guns and Ghosts
description: A horror-themed first-person shooter adventure where you fight the army of darkness as the famous John Gun. Darkness, horrifying creatures, deathly boss battles, and wave-based shooter arenas are just some of the challenges you will face. Also, expect some dark humor and many one-liners from Mr. Gun.

name: King of Gods: Angel the Awakening of a Demon
description: King Of Gods aka K.O.G. is a 2D RPG released by O.T.B.S. The game was developed and written by Westwood W. Hinds... The first release of K.O.G. is Chapter 1: Angel The Awakening Of A Demon....

name: Nobophobia
description: Nobophobia is an atmospheric 3D horror, where you have to find a way out of the mysterious labyrinth of rooms and corridors.

name: Eons of War
description: In this turn-based grand strategy game you take charge of a space civilization on an ever-changing battlefield where hyperspace and energy control mean survival. Inspired by Risk, Civilization, and chess.

name: Bliss Maze
description: A multiplayer online counter - terror game. Players paint their characters' skins, record their voices, enter the jungle of bliss, a place of terror guarded by "her," and fight for the power of Buddha seals through worship.

name: Megavaders 5000
description: "Megavaders 5000" is an indie game that remembers the old games of killing aliens driving your ship. With a retro style and simple gameplay.

name: Medieval Battle Simulator
description: "Medieval Battle Simulator" is an indie game that will allow you to simulate battles set in a military era with simple gameplay.

name: The Testing Floor
description: Welcome to The Testing Floor. Begin the preliminary testing phase for a prototype tool known as the C.U.B.E.R. Master the projectile-based teleportation system and Power Cube abilities all while solving puzzle-filled floors that push the C.U.B.E.R to its utmost limits.

name: Buddinpals: Take One Home With You !!
description: Buddinpals! A cutesy virtual pet game taking place in a college dorm and its semi-annoyed resident. Name your pet, dress it up and do fun stuff together! The good times will never, ever end!

name: Pudji
description: Pudji is an extremely difficult 2D platformer where you play as Pudji, the slightly overweight but self assured Ninja. Do you have what it takes?

name: Asterion
description: ASTERION is a 3D action and adventure game with puzzle elements, very much in the vein of Zelda games with a dash of Souls-like. You are Asterion, last in a long line of minotaurs bred to brave the dangers of the Labyrinth of Crete: an ancient, enigmatic, massive structure.

name: CubeTime
description: You are a cube, and you need to move very quickly to geometric shapes and collect control points. The goal of the game is to hold out as much as possible in time and collect more control points.

name: Parcheesi Boardgame Simulator
description: Play parcheesi on your computer, against cpu or with friends.

name: Expedition
description: You are an Expeditionist. One of a select few on a mission to discover new resources and technologies to aid in humanity’s quest of colonizing the galaxy. While exploring, you will struggle to survive the unique and unexpected challenges faced on your assigned planet.

name: Little elf
description: This is a simple casual game that throws a game of chess.

name: Cat's Puzzle
description: Cat's Puzzle is a simple cute slide puzzle game about fluffy purring beasts. Move parts of the picture around to solve the cat.

name: SuperHero in Training
description: SuperHero in Training is an upcoming VR Action Platformer planned to be released in late 2019/early 2020. The game puts the player in a comic-styled futuristic city. The player’s goal is to become the best hero they can, but in a world of heroes how is this possible?

name: Fallout 4: New Vegas
description: 'Fallout 4: New Vegas' is a community-driven project intended to recreate 'Fallout: New Vegas' in the Fallout 4 Creation Engine.

name: Escape the Enterprise
description: a mystery/puzzle solving game that takes place in future. Player controls the heroine to investigate what has happened inside a spaceship and escape from it eventually. The game has plenty of puzzles; unique, fascinating plot; and multiple endings.

name: Sexy Comedy: It Was a Mistake
Cross Love - Episode 1
description: Charming, pretty, and...a guy?! Yuu may have a bit of experience crossdressing, but when a mix up leaves him wearing his sister's clothes to school one day, he finds himself catching eyes - and hearts too! What happens next? Find out in this funny and lewd yaoi visual novel!

name: Pixel Shield
description: "Pixel Shield" is a game which requires fast reaction and good strategy. If you make a mistake, you lose and have to start over...

name: Super Navecitas 2
description: This video game is a space shooter in which all the elements are made in cardboard. The game tells the story of Cafard a Martian cockroach on his journey to Silcon Valley where the fate of his race and humanity will be decided.

name: Olea's Messenger
description:
Within a once mighty Kingdom, a never ending wave of enraged spirits hunt down every last living beeing in search for a vessel. 
But with the awakening of a long forgotten shrine and it's guardian, new hope arises.

name: Deadhunters
description:
Deadhunters is a cooperative rogue-playing game.
Choose your hero, embark on missions and make decisions together.
Loot, level up and die again and again in an ever changing world of darkness.
Conquer the damned and earn your rightful place in the Guild of Deadhunters!

name: Triggered: Assault
description: Triggered: Assault is a tactical, fun and competitive first person shooter for gun lovers, themed in the modern era of weapons and environments. Test your skills with players in your skill level and aim for victory!

name: Twisted Weapons
description: Plunder through a dungeon with crazy weapons in your hands that are comprised of fantastic modifications.

name: Star Zeal
description:
Star Zeal is a work in progress 4x space strategy game with a focus on a more personal take with your civilization and its characters. A mixture between a procedural, open ended RPG and a space civilization builder. You are represented in the game by a customizable character as the leader of your civilization, your character can die and be replaced by your progeny or other desired replacements, like a protege.

The main game has you play in the Milky Way galaxy with pre-made star clusters and systems like our own the Sol system and many procedural star clusters. You will be able to play as many different species, even minor ones, from large militaristic empires to isolated nomadic species, or even a pirate faction. The end goals of each faction created, or pre-made can be extremely variable. Sometimes a faction only wants to hide from everyone in their tiny corner of the universe.

One of the main features is the procedural nature of many important aspects of the game. From characters to star clusters and even the research. This also allows a vast play area where exploration is valued.

name: Bloom
description: "Bloom" is an erotic yuri visual novel about a hopeless romantic who meets a jaded girl that doesn't believe in love. Will Lily adapt to this casual, no-strings-attached relationship with Eve? Or will she prove that true love isn't dead after all?

name: Shadow Unit
description: It's war and it seems really bad for us. Take part in this world and decide your way: Shadow Unit or Warmongers.

name: Starfighter X
description: Anarchy throughout the galaxy has forced all pilots to kill or be killed. The stars are a savage battlefield where only the best will survive. Claim your rightful place as the top captain in free-for-all combat. Compete for position on the galactic leaderboards to become Starfighter X.

name: Mr. Grayscale
description: A Retro throwback where you have to platform, rotate the stage and phase through colours to make it to the end of each level as quick as possible.

name: ReWorld Online
description: ReWorld Online is a modbox MMO set in a medieval fantastic world. Most of the world around you is destroyed and you will have to choose some towns/city/castle to help, or destroy. Your play style, race, and decision will determine your relations with the others players and will lead to tensions. This game is about freedom and infinite possibilities…

name: Scally's World: Verbs
description:
Scally's World: Verbs is an educational game staring the titular Scally, 
In this game you learn how to spell verbs, read various phrases and general writing skills. 
Designed for 4-11 year olds with over 400 verbs and synonyms

name: Nobunaga's Ambition: Taishi with Power-Up Kit
description: Nobunaga’s Ambition: Taishi remains true to the long-running franchise’s historical simulation gameplay; allowing players to relive some of the most epic battles and notable events of the Sengoku Era in Japan. The Sengoku Era was a period where regional lords fiercely fought for supremacy, to claim dominance and unite the lands. Players will have to exploit a wide breadth of tactical options to create fresh strategies that allow new ways to gain an advantage over the opponent. Strategies do not only focus on the Military Campaigns but also on managing the Production Facilities and Trade Routes to continuously expand territory and increase the strength of the army.

name: Dragon Master
description: With the Dragon Master game, 1 to 8 players can go head-to-head against each other taking down dragons left and right, scoring as many points as possible!

name: Terminal Sickness
description:
A story driven text adventure following a mother's survival after the outbreak of a global pandemic.

You play a female protagonist in a non-linear, text based adventure. The world is detailed, interactive and very dark.

name: Silent Night
description: There is a 'presence' haunting the long forgotten church of 'Northfield'. Angry spirits seek revenge for an ancient crime, from the terrible time of The Black Death. Ghost-hunter, Nigel Danvers, has been sent to investigate the case, using his kitbag of ghost-hunting gadgets, on the loneliest night of the year.

name: Impostor syndrome
description: Visual novel about personal choice and importance of human's life. You will play as Russian teenager Luka, who decided to end his life in subway, but you could make it not happened, travelling across his past.

name: Hentai Puzzle Logic Game
description: Hentai Puzzle Logic Game - this is a logical game with a lot of frank pictures. Solve puzzles, and get the opportunity to see the most beautiful parts of the body of girls.

name: ColonyShip-4: Survivors
description: Tactical, turn-based combat with RPG style character progression, equipment customization, research, and a varied, open-world campaign.

name: Save HomeWorld
description: Your orbital platform is the last line of defence. Protect your planet against destruction!

name: Erotic Colouring Book
description: Erotic Colour Book offers color-in drawings featuring a nice variety of adults drawings for every taste: girls, from behind, big, THIS THING and even more..

name: HotHead
description: Play as HotHead as he rids the world of pesky monsters.

name: Ir/rational Investigator
description:
From the writer & narrative designer of Penumbra, FTL and Driver: San Francisco comes Ir/rational Investigator - a noir adventure game with a unique, text-based argument system that lets players use deductive logic to solve cases and influence the story. 
 
The game follows Rick Lombardo, a private dick in a town short on cops and overflowing with scum. It's a town where any Tom, Dick or Sally can get themselves a license to solve crime, or failing that: a gun, a reputation and a bad attitude. 
 
The game is due for release episodically, for iPhone and PC, some time in 2013. 
 
It's a commercial follow up to Ir/rational Redux, which garnered over half a million plays web-wide, and a coveted 4/5 user score on Newgrounds. In fact, if you want to know what Ir/rational is, you can play it right now!

name: Quiz Master Zero and the Silky Road
Drawn to Light
description: Drawn to Light is a true puzzle game that will test your brain, thoughts and emotions. Get the Energy Units to the Lamps using precise logic and visual perception. Avoid hazards and use obstacles to your advantage. Simple, challenging and brilliantly designed puzzles.

name: Battle X: Birth of the Alliance
Silent Streets: The Mockingbird's Last Dive
Jammy Road
description:
Hey! It's Penguin here! Come and help please! Too many cars out there!
Take part in a very heavy job, help Penguin manage the traffic!
Cars and birds Everywhere! You have to be very fast and quick, if you don't want to crash the cars!
At the same time you should take care of your score on the international leaderboard.

name: Jason The Greek: The Ladies of Lemnos
Twin Souls: The Path of Shadows
Between the City and the Needle
Clumzee
description: Help Clumzee find the right path! Navigate a cute but clumsy creature through many dangerous worlds. Move Clumzee up by controlling his sticky legs, and be sure not to fall down. He must move quickly and avoid mysterious water creatures and their spiteful minions who will try to stop him. Get as far as possible and reach the highest score. Collect golden coins to enter new worlds and eat as many fireflies as possible. Your new friends such as Tiger, Pirate, Viking, Samurai and many others will come to your side. Together you will conquer canyon winds, deep forests and even outer space!

name: Cheongsam
description: "Cheongsam" is a piece of "virtual theatre": while you take on the part of Michael, an advanced AI takes on the part of Maggie. By controlling his pose and facial expressions you act together with her in a refined performance to your own taste: you might play a little shy, and Maggie might be played a little cheeky; somewhat cocky, or somewhat brisk...

name: Red Bull Air Race - The Game
Arcanist Revival
description: Arcanist Revival is a turn-based strategy game based off of Jagex's Arcanists. Players take turns to utilize one of sixteen spells, chosen by the player beforehand, in order to defeat their opponents.

name: Hentai 2+2=4
description: Hentai 2+2=4 - a logical game in which you need to solve mathematical examples and open pictures.

name: Island Survival
description:
《Island Survival 》is a first-person Survival game with realistic scenes, rich contents and exciting plots. The island is in great danger and there are a large number of zombies. They try their best to survive in the island, they try their best to have weapons, they try their best to build their own houses, they try their best to explore the island and catch prey. 
WASD controls the task 
Mouse wheel switch weapons 
Mouse control lens

name: Silence Notes
description:
《Silence Notes 》is a third-person action adventure game with novel game modes, realistic model movements and exciting game process. The game is divided into three levels. In the first level, players need to collect five notes, which are scattered throughout the game scene. The second level is the parkour mode, the player needs to escape the big demon king's chase to reach the end point smoothly; The third level is maze mode. Players need to successfully walk through the maze and find a white Npc to win. 
WASD controls the task 
Space leaping

name: Existence = !Existence;
description: 2066 year. The planet was overwhelmed by unemployment, poverty and crisis, humanity is getting closer to lifting the limit on life expectancy, but the situation on the planet has caused stratification among the population. You are a member of a hacker group that fights for the rights of mankind.

name: Dwarf Swordsman
description:
《Dwarf Swordsman》 is a first-person action adventure game with Chinese style architecture, beautiful environment, realistic model and action stimulation. The player is located in an occupied city, can use four kinds of melee weapons, wipe out all the enemy warriors in the city can win, the player needs to avoid the warrior's attack to avoid being hit, guarantee their health, eliminate all warriors! 
WASD movement 
Mouse wheel switch weapons 
Mouse control lens

name: Horror Maze: Sci-Fi Edition
description:
Arcade gameplay with modern sci-fi design.
This sci-fi horror game is an homage one of our favorite arcade games.
Collect all the dots without getting caught by the 4 horrifying space monsters to beat the high score.

name: Border of Insanity
description: How fast will you go insane knowing you are the only person left in the entire world? How fast will you realize that everything is lost and life will never again be as it was?

name: Bulletgrounds
description: Bulletgrounds is World War 2 themed multiplayer arcade shooter that features vehicles, large maps, destruction and build elements.

name: ILive
description: A game in the classic platformer genre, with elements of survival. Interesting style of decoration locations. You have to avoid collisions with aggressive robots androidiki that will come across you all the way. Which will follow you, shoot, gnaw! you are harmless ifonia

name: Chroma: Sexy Hentai Girls
description:
Each time you finish a level you will unlock a new image.
For each girl you have 5 images (5 levels) :
- Girl fully dressed
- Girl half dressed
- Girl wearing a bikini / underwear
- Girl topless
- Girl fully naked

name: The Final Frontier
description: The Final Frontier is a game about star battles and meaning of freedom. It's a fascinating journey through the endless, procedurally generated space in a universe where you struggle for freedom taking a role of the rebel leader.

name: Horror Maze: Dungeon Edition
description:
Arcade gameplay with modern design.
This horror-themed maze game is an homage of one our favorite arcade games.
Collect all the pills without getting caught by the 4 horrifying ghosts to beat the highscore.

name: Hammer World: Dimension Traveler
description: "Hammer World: Dimension Traveler" is a first-person metroidvania with physics-based combat built in Unreal Engine 4. Explore mysterious dimensions, unlock new abilities, and fight back against evil with your hammer friend!

name: Helhats
description: Topdown roguelike dungeon crawler set in a simulation with enemies themed as helmets and hats

name: Pocket Invader
description:
"Take control of a space craft travelling through a hostile, pixealted space world. Battle a huge variety of enemy ships and bosses throughout several levels. Unlock different space crafts with their own unique abilities. Don’t forget to upgrade your ship and power-ups, because you will need them! 
 
Get ready for a exciting journey through space with challenging levels, mighty enemies and breathtaking boss battles. Face off with several bosses, all with their own unique abilities and weaknesses. 
 
Unlock all achievements and make it to the top of the leaderboards! Show off to your friends and let them know who the Best is! Are you able to beat the Invaders?"

name: The Settlers: History Collection
description:
The Settlers History Collection includes History Editions of all seven previous Settlers games, which includes gold versions of each game with all expansions.

Included Games
The Settlers (1993) History Edition
The Settlers II – Veni, Vidi, Vici History Edition
The Settlers III History Edition
The Settlers IV History Edition
The Settlers – Heritage of Kings History Edition
The Settlers – Rise of an Empire History Edition
The Settlers 7 History Edition

name: BC Project
description: BC Project gameplay is more than a 4vs4 team battle. There are various rule settings such as the “Area Controlling Fight” where teams accumulate magical powers in the magical rings! Battles will become more strategical especially with the abilities of each playable character.

name: Snot and Fluff
description:
An interactive story for children with features of an adventure game.
“Mum, Dad, can I watch a movie?” - how often do we hear these requests. This is where “Snot and Fluff - a Space Adventure” will speed to the rescue. This is an interactive story with features of an adventure game for children aged 4 to 10.
This is a funny and educational story of friendship, courage and helping others. It will take your child and yourself on an amazing journey to distant galaxies full of colourful planets. You will meet various creatures, strange animals and together you will experience an unforgettable adventure.
The game DOES NOT include any advertisements, references to Internet websites or micro-payments! Your child may safely use it on a tablet or phone.
You will meet two friends: Snot and Fluff. The former is a traveller, an adventurous globetrotter, whereas the latter is quite the opposite - a home-loving amateur baker of new types of cookies. One day, Snot feels bored with everyday tasks and sets out on a space journey, forgetting about his friend for a while. Fluffy, lonely and longing for the company of his buddy, builds a rocket and embarks on a journey to look for Snot. Will he manage to find him?
Key features:
• This is a story created by the authors of an interactive tale which gained global recognition: “Amelia and Terror of the Night” and illustrated by Agata Karelus, a renowned artist loved by children
• Hundreds of cartoon animals, monsters and weird objects
• 45 boards with hand-drawn illustrations
• Professional narrator reading the story
• More than 35 minutes of professional soundtrack
• More than 400 funny sounds
• 88 hidden stars to be discovered
• A secret room at the end of the story
• 3D effect while tilting the tablet/phone
• A perfect story for children aged 4–10, both for boys and girls
• A story with a moral
• It can be read as a bedtime story
• Easy, intuitive navigation
• Page index, which makes it possible to gain easy access to any board in the story
• 5 language versions: English, Polish, Russian, Spanish, Chinese
Furthermore:
• Together find a key to the pirates’ secret box
• Sit behind the steering wheel of a space rocket
• Solve the mystery of the electric cave
• Visit an alien spaceship
• Help the Crescent King solve his embarrassing problem
• Meet princess Candy
• See what the Moon looks like on the inside
Have you had enough of classical fairy tales? The Sleeping Beauty is snoring too loud? Three Little Pigs have finally built a stronghold? Puss in Boots started chasing around barefoot? If so, it’s time you showed your child stories created by OhNoo studio.
What have other parents said about the game?
5/5 – “A great interactive story without violence. Together with my daughter, we continue to discover new animals hidden on colourful planets. Reading the story while looking for hidden elements turn out to be just the thing. Funny and amusing!”
5/5 – “My five-year-old son loves this tale. This is his favourite bedtime story. Sometimes we also listen to the English version and I believe this is a perfect way to start learning the English language. Education combined with play. I can recommend it.”
5/5 – “My six-year-old daughter was delighted. It’s the best interactive book for kids I’ve ever seen. It’s fun and colourful. The choice of the reader and soundtrack are also impressive. It’s great fun for younger and older kids as well as adults :). I can recommend it. Your child will love it.”
Contact
If you observe any problems with the story, have any questions or comments, please contact us at your convenience:

name: Victory Belles: Battleship Girls of WWII
Adventure Time Run: The Ooo Expedition
Baby Animals: Wooden Preschool Puzzle for Kids
Spiraloid
description:
Spiraloid is an infinite, rhythm based jumping game that launches you into a highly addictive 3D spiralling corkscrew of challenges!
Work with the rhythm of the pulsing soundtrack as you navigate, jump and roll your way through a psychedelic gauntlet of treacherous terrain and tantalising traps!
As the twisting, winding path unfolds before your eyes, avoid the harrowing hazards and collect the glittering gems in order to unlock unique, mind-bending levels and purchase power ups!
Just when you think you've mastered the gauntlet - think again! Can you maintain your rhythm amidst a panoply of prickly probes when the whole world starts to spin?!

name: Vikings vs. Waves
description: Vikings vs Waves is a vibrant and addictive infinite jumping/running game.

name: Team Guardian
description: An MMO-style action RPG with a 1:1 live PVP system! Dominate your opponent with your characters by strategizing the battles. More than 20 different classes for characters.

name: Ocean Classics Volume 1
description:
Why not power up your retro games collection with this bundle of 8 super titles from the UK’s ‘80s monster publishing powerhouse OCEAN SOFTWARE.

This impressive and nostalgic compilation includes the following classics:

• Tunnel B1
• Last Rites
• ELF
• Sleepwalker
• Pushover
• The Great Escape
• Central Intelligence
• Where Time Stood Still

name: Horror Souls
description:
Survive the era of darkness. 
Experience a terrifying horror adventure. 
Escape the creatures of the void. 
Solve the mystery of your missing father. 
Retrieve the Soul of the Forest. 
Lose your mind in the madness.

name: Cat Demon Island
description: Cat Demon Island is a first-person action adventure game with realistic action, detailed scenes and action thrills. Players can use two weapons, samurai sword, bow and arrow, to eliminate the island scattered variation of the black cats can win, try to avoid the black cats attack and eliminate all black cats!

name: Space Ashes
description: A ship is sent on space stations to burn swarming and unknown forms of vegetation.

name: Hentai Idol
description: Hentai is not just love 2d chan, it's much bigger than you think!

name: Space Transfer
description:
《Space Transfer》is a third-person adventure game. Players need to find cars scattered on the planet and transport them to the base platform by spaceship. This game scene model is exquisite, the action is lifelike, the player can drive the car, the ship, the interest is high, drives the car to the ship, then drives the ship to the base platform, unloads the car to the platform, finds 10 cars and transports successfully can obtain the victory!Two platforms which are located on the mountain outside the forest. Vehicles can be placed on the platform respectively. After unloading the vehicle to the platform, you can press the ESC key to check the amount collected. 
WASD controls the characters and the tools to drive them 
CV spacecraft lift 
ZX speeds up and slows down 
EH takes and leaves the vehicle

name: Spacecraft War
description:
《Spacecraft War》is a first-person shooting game. An alien ship carrying an alien mutant dog fell in no man's land. As the only remaining soldier of the special forces, it can win by destroying all the alien mutant dogs. The game scene is exquisite science fiction, the game model action is real exciting, the player needs to maintain the life value and use two kinds of guns to wipe out all the dogs can win. 
WASD controls character movement 
F pick up the gun

name: Catfender
description: Everyone likes mummies, cats and beautiful concubines of Pharaoh. Or at least some of these three.

name: Hard Rock Zombie Truck Plastiline
description: Hard Rock Zombie Truck Plastiline - plasticine and more bloody remake of the original game.

name: M-Plan
description: An exploration, but not amazing game.

name: A Top-Down Job: Blood Gain
description: A Top-Down Job: Blood Gain is a indie stealth-action offering time-tested gameplay.

name: Dash Island
description:
Dash Island has been evacuated! You will be sent down to Dash Island with the sole purpose of liberating the Island and returning peace to the citizens. Your character must make their way through a maze with the objective of reaching the end, while avoiding enemies. The level will reset if the enemies catch you! Some levels will be timed and some will require you to activate switches throughout the maze. 
- Fast & Fluid game-play, no boring tutorials, start playing within seconds. 
- Play in 2 bonus modes: Run Around collecting Pysankas (Little Eggs) while keeping your head up for enemies on your tail. Up the ante with the creatively named "hard mode" where the faster (angrier) enemies come out to play.

name: Monster Adventurer
description: This is a simple turn-based game. Diverse teammates, simple tasks, easy battles, a bit annoying BOSS.

name: Dark Inside
description:
Which of us did not wanted stay outside of the laws? Enter, loot and exit! Altough it seems fun, it is so dangerous and scary. Well, what is the main purpose? Would we find the statue that we are looking for and stay alive in this abandoned town. 
Loot as you can, run and fight for more!

name: Grimo
description:
Grimo is story driven stealth action in pixel art.
Cyberchurch, neural implants, advanced robots and augmented humans all of these are common things in Grimo's world.
It’s on!

name: Looking_for_food
description: Simple RPG games, go maze, destroy monsters, upgrade, get props.

name: Ruins War
description:
《Ruins War》is a first-person shooter action adventure game, the player is in an abandoned city with many enemy troops. Players need to try their best to avoid enemy attacks, maintain health, and destroy all the enemy can win. Killing the enemy can pick up the enemy's weapons. Players have two types of weapons: sniper rifle and M4 machine gun. M4 machine gun needs to kill the enemy to acquire weapons and increase bullets, rationally use weapons and terrain, and eliminate the enemy to maintain the city's stability. 
WASD controls the character 
Mouse wheel switch weapons 
Mouse control lens 
ESC to suspend

name: Kulzas Tomb
description: Kulzas Tomb sinks the player into a first person dungeon crawling action game. Strap on your wizards hat and plunge into the depths of Kulzas Tomb. Don't dally around your life force runs out over time so you will have to collect food and treasures to stay alive.

name: Destination Dungeon: Tomb of Repentance
description: Destination Dungeon is a new casual style of dungeon crawling. Instead of roaming around a huge dungeon looking for opportunity the opportunities come to you. Random events take place including traps, locked doors, enemy encounters, merchants, and more.

name: Quixzel Rush: Christmas Helper
description: Quixzel Rush Christmas Helper brings fun and excitement to casual arcade gamers. Crash through cookies, collect heals, and maximize the time you can survive in this high score arcade game.

name: Ambulance Simulator
description: Do you want to know what it's like to save lives? In Ambulance Simulator your task is to provide immediate medical aid to sick and wounded spread across an entire city. Choose the most urgent assignment from many different calls for help. Decide who gets to be rescued by using a triage system.

name: Smart Factory
description:
《Smart Factory》 is a third-person action adventure game with realistic scenes and exciting process. The player is in an abandoned factory, can open the box to use the sword as a weapon, can also use the fist, exterminate all enemies in the factory can win!When attacking the enemy, you should try to avoid the enemy's attack and ensure your own blood. If you encounter something like a jug you can break it up and get a bloody potion.There is a box in front of the birth point. If you open it, you can get a weapon sword. 
WASD control 
Q roll, break the jar 
Pick up the item and open the box 
Left mouse button attack, right click block 
mouseover 
I pause and view equipment 
The left Shift running

name: !BurnToDie!
description: !BurnToDie! - Hardcore platformer, in which you will take on the role of a brave cubic hero, who, despite hundreds of traps and obstacles rushed to save his beloved.

name: Hell`s Little Story 2
description: Hells Little Story 2 is a platformer in its best manifestations. A mixture of different game mechanics, shooting, attempts to escape from monsters and achievements - in this game there is all of this.

name: Moduwar
description: Moduwar is a unique take on Real-Time Strategy. Take control of a Modu - an alien creature with an ability to grow different organs, split and re-attach them, depending on your personal playstyle. Split into dozens of tiny units, or grow one giant mobile-base, in both single-player and multiplayer modes.

name: Spaceguy III
description: Promoting the well-being of communism across the Universe is never easy. The capitalist aliens conceive the despicable plans in order to put obstacles on your way.

name: Multimaker
description: Corporation "Omega" has developed a special test for the distribution of people by category. Can you pass the test and secure a bright future?

name: Night Magic
description: Are you ready to face an eerie and unknown mystery? Are you ready to abandon the world and plunge into the most complex puzzles? This is not a game where you can go, knocking heads of monsters.

name: Furry Animals Bombing
description: Furry Animals bombing is an interesting arcade strongly resembling famous Angry bird, but instead of birds we will have here moss lumps, and the pigs will be replaced by funny aliens who decided to take over the planet.

name: Dragon valley
description:
Dragon valley is a first-person action adventure game with realistic model and exciting process. Players are located in a grand canyon.You can use two weapons, bow and sword. Destroy all dragons in the canyon alive and you will win.There are two weapons, bow and sword in front of the birth point. You can attack when you pick up. Players can switch freely. 
WASD controls the task； 
F picks up the weapon； 
Mouse wheel switch weapons； 
Mouse control perspective；

name: Trapnoid 2
description: Save the winter and defeat the Evil!

name: Only Shadows Left Behind
description: Only Shadow Left Behind is a shoot 'em up with a top view in which you have to clean out the city from the clumps of shadow with a variety of weapons.

name: FhaMazein
description: Infinite maze ! Will you find the exit ?

name: Retro Synthesis
description: Retro Synthesis is a tech-noir narrative game about being torn apart between obligations and conscience. You are a police detective named Harrison Noels whose wife just passed away but there is no time for grieve. You are forced to take a case that is more complex than you think.

name: Ragnania HD
description:
《神位纷争》是由北京微笑科技有限公司研发，一款采用「团队动作对战」模式的在线游戏。 
玩家能够在开阔的3D立体的封闭场地中，通过冲刺、跳跃、飞行的操作组合自由行动，并躲避子弹、接近敌人，使用硬派的格斗近战连段或是丰富的远程术式击倒对手，在180秒的超短时限内凭借比分赢下对局。

name: Professor Chuckenhope
description:
Take to the stage, take aim, and thrill the crowd with your throwing skills in a victorian stage act. Stray from hitting targets, and you may face a night in the cells. Unless of course, you can escape and make a run for the theatre! 
The show must go on!

name: Protocore
description: The bad news : you’re lost in a massive spaceship, your memory’s gone and there’s an army of robots that wants you dead. The good news? You have guns. Lots of guns. So lock and load and get your memories back, one bullet at a time.

name: Midnight Wave
description: Midnight Wave is a samurai cyberpunk tactical action RPG with immense customization, narrative choice, and innovative gameplay mechanic combinations, set in a world full of katanas, mega corporations, and elemental powers. Inspired by legendary classic titles such as Fire Emblem and Super Smash Brothers and more recent games like the Mass Effect series, Midnight Wave invites you to take part in a total genre mash-up adventure like no-other!

name: Trials of the Illuminati: Snack Time Jigsaw Puzzles
description:
Trials of the Illuminati: Snack Time Jigsaw Puzzles is series of jigsaw puzzles for a casual relaxing time. Game features 42 piece, 150 piece, and 351 piece puzzle varieties. Two extra modes also exist for each of the piece counts. Illuminati Rank 1 takes half the pieces away from top, bottom, left, or right. Illuminati Rank 2 randomly takes half the pieces placing one piece for every two pieces you place. Both ranks auto complete after your available pieces are placed. This can increase or decrease the difficulty of the puzzles.

Twelve different jigsaws of varied delicious snacks. Progress is saved in the event you have to stop playing.

A calm and relaxing experience with hours of entertainment!

name: Kmenta
description: It's a game with no content. It's characterized by no content. It exists for an unspeakable purpose, but you can use it to pass the time.

name: Super Hockey Ball
description:
Street hockey in virtual reality! Super Hockey Ball is an explosive sports/adventure experience featuring intuitive controls, physics-based gameplay, and cartoon-inspired design.

Hit a ball. Earn points. Be a superstar!

name: Ball Kicker
description: Ball Kicker is a fast-paced 3D platformer in which players control balls to fight objectives and crush their opponents. This physics-based game features many exciting mechanics such as grappling hooks, bombs, dashes, blasters, and much more. Players finally get the chance to use their balls and smash!

name: Lovely Island
description: Romantic story about the adventures of the main character and four girls on a deserted island in the nearest future. Will you solve the riddle of the island? Will you get romance with one of the beautiful girls?

name: Technolites: Episode 1
description: Technolites is an action packed top down shooter with an epic animated adventure, fully voice acted. The first game in the genre to allow you to build your own ship, with dozens of unique parts and weapons.

name: N1RV Ann-A: Cyberpunk Bartender Action
description:
"Escape from VA11 HALL-A’s Glitch City to Saint Alicia, an idyllic tourist paradise with an upscale bar called N1RV Ann-A. But opulence and extravagance are merely smokescreens: the artificial island hides a seedy underbelly. Its dystopian economy touches all aspects of life as bar patrons contend with mafia extortion, human trafficking and other sordid crimes.

For bartender Sam, trouble hits close to home. Her relationship with her partner Leon, who moonlights as a Yakuza, is on the rocks as she works hard to care for their 8-year-old son, Tony.

Is their relationship dead in the waters of the caribbean sea? Or will love prevail in the unnatural city?"

name: Misfolded
description: Misfolded is a 2.5D narrative game. You play The Monomer, a dark, melancholy and lonely character moving through the healthy world around him.

name: Warhammer Age of Sigmar: Realm War
description:
Fight and battle in an ultimate action pvp challenge to rule the Mortal Realms.
Amass an army of powerful cards including Generals, Heroes and Summons. Collect cards, level them up and use their power to crush your opponents on the battlegrounds of the arena.

Choose from many unique cards to create your own deck strategies. Deploy your powerful units to the battlefield and send them to combat. Enhance your tactics by deciding when to unleash legendary game changing General and Hero Special Powers, designed to combine with infinite potential.

Send your heroes to take control of the mighty Realmgate and boost your deck with unique and super powered cards. These legendary magic cards can be played without cost, so choose your moment wisely.

name: H.E.L.M.E.T. Force: Rise of the Machines
Pocket Wars: Protect or Destroy
description:
Welcome to Pocket Wars!
Take control of your army and guide them to victory in this retro-style, turn based strategy board game.
Bring reinforcements and supplies to an ailing 13th Century Castle in Wales, Britain before the invading Uzgoth Horde can destroy it.
Help the employees of a mining station escape the invading elemental demons of Io. Or, maybe you prefer to be the Destroyer and bring vengeance to Hrethra and ensure that the LunarCol employees will never escape?

name: Cradle of Links VR
description: Is an adventure VR game developed for HTC VIVE headsets. Action style horror deeply thought out the world. Gameplay based on dynamic scenes fighting creepy creatures and solving variety interactive puzzles.
